title: Ep 123: 3 Months of Poo-Crastination
description:
In This Episode: We have a set of parents trying to adopt OP's ex fiancé, a BF goes on a trip abroad and decides that he is just going to stay there, husband tells his new wife that he could see himself cheating in the future, and a listener has a Christmas miracle. And for this week's Circle Jerdge we catch up on 3 months worth of poop tracking.
